first of all thanks for the effort/upload

as some people mentioned above some movies are slightly out of sync.

tommyknockers for example CD1 by +200 ms, CD2 ok. (can be corrected by using vdubmod --> audio interleaving --> audio skew corection --> new file)
vlc now also supports audio skew correction during playback (adv. options --> Synchronisation) but to fix this permanently use eg. vdubmod.

mhm it seems CD2 of the tommyknockers is also out of sync (+200 ms too) but only after about half an hour.

fixing that is little bit more complicated ... you can convert the mp3 audio to a wav-file in vdubmod, open it in wavelab and add 200ms after about 30 minutes then convert it back to mp3 and add it in vdubmod and disable the old audio and save it a a new file.

IT and Needul Things are in sync btw.
thx again for sharing this very nice collection!

i usc VLC media player and it has menus where you can resync audio and subs and also change colour and sharpness and lots of other settings
how do i watch these?
Creepshow is out of synchrony

Creepshow is out of sync +200 too.

I solved it

With virtualdub, open the movie, go to audio>interleaving, add 200ms, go back to audio, and mark the option "full processing mode". Now go to video, and mark the option, "direct stream copy". Click on file>Save as AVI,
and wait the ending of process.
